fields.text: Thank you for calling TechConnexion, the San Francisco boutique recruiting agency connecting innovative companies with top tech talent.
For companies looking to hire outstanding tech professionals, press [INDEX].
To speak directly with one of our recruiting specialists about your hiring needs, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to a recruiting specialist.
To learn more about our partnership models and fee structures, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our partnerships department.
For job seekers interested in new tech career opportunities, press [INDEX].
To submit your resume and explore current openings, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we route you to our candidate services team.
To schedule a consultation with one of our career advisors, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to a recruitment advisor.
